metadata.title: CVE-2016-2518 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The MATCH_ASSOC function in NTP before version 4.2.8p9 and 4.3.x before4.3.92 allows remote attackers to cause an out-of-bounds reference via anaddpeer request with a large hmode value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2518` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3').
